content: Love the part about “if you asked me 10 years ago”. I was much the same way- 10 years ago I was struggling with exhibiting “extrovert” behaviors to succeed, which often felt exhausting. I wished I had just been born that way in the first place so I wouldn’t have to work at it. But now being around extroverts I can see the advantages that being able to go away, reflect, and most importantly be comfortable with just my own thoughts can bring. I am one with my introversion :)
